name: Chat With Agent
description: Have a direct conversation with a specialist agent. Allows the concierge to chat with agents, pass context, maintain conversation history, and get responses. Perfect for complex interactions that need back-and-forth dialog with specialists.

message.description: Message to send to the agent

context.description: Optional context object to pass to the agent (user preferences, relevant data, etc.)

conversation_history.description: Optional array of previous messages in this conversation

max_tokens.description: Maximum tokens for the agent's response
